name: Standard Room
description: A standard room is the most basic type of accommodation offered by a hotel. It usually comes with essential amenities like a bed, a bathroom, and basic furniture. The standard room is generally designed for solo travelers or couples who are looking for a budget-friendly option.

name: Deluxe Room
description: A deluxe room is a step up from a standard room and usually comes with more space, upgraded amenities, and better views. Deluxe rooms typically have more luxurious furnishings, such as a larger bed, plush seating, and higher-quality linens. They may also include additional amenities like a mini-fridge, a work desk, or a seating area.

name: Suite
beds and bath: 1 King bed, 1 Queen bed, 1 sofa set 2 private bathrooms
description: A suite is the most luxurious type of room available in a hotel. It is designed for travelers who are looking for a spacious and comfortable place to stay with a higher level of privacy. A suite typically includes a separate living room, bedroom, and bathroom. Suites may also come with additional amenities like a kitchenette, a Jacuzzi tub, or a balcony with a stunning view. They are ideal for families, couples, or travelers who need more space and privacy.
